person.note: Liu(2) Ban [1220] Shi's [1226] grandson, Lizhi's [1207] son, Fangshan's [7292] father, Chang's [3580] younger brother, Han(1) Zong(1)'s [657] son-in-law. His youngest brother's father-in-law was Zhang(1) Mian's [262] (qv.) nephew, Yi(3) [3148]. Jiangxi TZ, 21.15b; XCB, 301.13a, 303.3a-3b, 423.1b; SHY:ZG, 66.25b. CBD, 5, 3853-4.
